This codebook is provided to assist in determining how to set up a query to the CDC Wonder API. The best way to become familiar with the API is to use the web interface: https://wonder.cdc.gov.  Also, read the [Introduction to wonderapi](wonderapi.html) to learn about the basic sections of CDC Wonder query requests.

             dblabel           dbname dbcode        dbagree
1             Births natality-current    D66 action-I Agree
2 Detailed Mortality        ucd-icd10    D76 action-I Agree
